extendedInfo.description: Ping Pong World is a new ping pong style based on the table tennis classic game PONG, created by Atari, that mix soccer and ping pong.â 2 game modes: ping pong league and ping pong tournament.â Online worldwide leaderboards to compare with other Ping Pong World players -> http://pingpongworld.fentudroid.com/pingpongworld.aspâ 4 levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard and very hard.â 64 countries and 8 divisions.Enyoy this classic game (arkanoid style) and send your scores to our PONG page.Will you be able to win first division of ping pong?pong, ping pong, classic games, arkanoid, soccer, breakout, atari, retro, free

reviews.title: Needs one thing..
reviews.comment: Love it.  But I think there should be a way to toggle between timed matches and matches where you play to 7 or 8. If that was added as a gameplay option id rate this 5 stars. I hope something like that happens soon...
reviews.author: Jeff Crosby

reviews.title: Love tournament mode but some ideas
reviews.comment: 1. Change the timer to a numeric count down. Close matches at the end I\'d like to know exactly how long is left 2. Add more countries... let\'s expand this out with more countries and groups  3. Change the scoring leader board to something more easily tracked. Ie. Wins worth X pts, scoring X goals in a game worth X.. . Giving up X goals worth X... You get times X bonus whatever division weakness of the team you pick.. don\'t like how unpredictable the scoring is...and ilike to compete with others Internationa
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amesome game
reviews.comment: Very fun but here are some ideas like you could play online,some power ups could be like the other player freezes, there could be more than 1 ball at a time and you could be able to score them,and sometimes there could be two balls at a time and there could be a fake ball too.do this and I will give five stars. Wait one more idea you could slow down the other player.keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Adrian Galvan

reviews.title: Brilliant!
